named-query.name: Vehicle.findByPlate
named-query.query: select v from Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByIds
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a where a.id in ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByClientDni
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a JOIN Vehicle v JOIN Client c where c.dni = ?1

named-query.name: WorkOrder.findByPlateNumber
named-query.query: select a from WorkOrder a JOIN Vehicle v where v.plateNumber = ?1

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findByInvoiceId
named-query.query: select m from Invoice f join f.workOrders w join w.vehicle.client c join c.paymentMeans m where f.id = ?1

named-query.name: Mechanic.findByDni
named-query.query: select m from Mechanic m where m.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.findByNumber
named-query.query: select f from Invoice f where f.number = ?1

named-query.name: Invoice.getNextInvoiceNumber
named-query.query: select max(f.number) + 1 from Invoice f

named-query.name: SparePart.findByCode
named-query.query: select s from SparePart s where s.code = ?1

named-query.name: SparePart.findUnderStock
named-query.query: select p from SparePart p where p.stock < p.minStock

named-query.name: SparePart.findByDescription
named-query.query: select s from SparePart s where s.description = ?1

named-query.name: SparePart.findUnderStockNotPending
named-query.query: select p from SparePart p where p.stock < p.minStock and p.id not in (select l.sparePart.id from Order o JOIN o.lines l where o.status = uo.ri.cws.domain.StatusEnum.PENDING)

named-query.name: Order.findOrdersPending
named-query.query: select o.lines from Order o where o.status = uo.ri.cws.domain.StatusEnum.PENDING

named-query.name: Order.findBySparePartCode
named-query.query: select o from Order o JOIN o.lines l where l.sparePart.code = ?1

named-query.name: Order.findByCode
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.code = ?1

named-query.name: Order.findByProviderNif
named-query.query: select o from Order o where o.provider.nif = ?1

named-query.name: Provider.findByNif
named-query.query: select p from Provider p where p.nif = ?1

named-query.name: Provider.findByNameMailPhone
named-query.query: select p from Provider p where p.name = ?1 and p.email = ?2 and p.phone = ?3

named-query.name: Provider.findByName
named-query.query: select p from Provider p where lower(p.name) like CONCAT('%',?1,'%')

named-query.name: Provider.findBySpCode
named-query.query: select distinct p from Provider p JOIN Supply s where s.sparePart.code = ?1

named-query.name: Supply.findByNifAndCode
named-query.query: select s from Supply s where s.provider.nif = ?1 and s.sparePart.code = ?2

named-query.name: Supply.findByProviderNif
named-query.query: select s from Supply s where s.provider.nif = ?1

named-query.name: Supply.findBySparePartCode
named-query.query: select s from Supply s where s.sparePart.code = ?1

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findPaymentMeansByClientId
named-query.query: select p from PaymentMean p JOIN Client c where c.id = ?1

named-query.name: PaymentMean.findPaymentMeansByClientDni
named-query.query: select p from PaymentMean p JOIN Client c where c.dni = ?1
